name: [Resist]
description:
WASD + mouse

This was done for the #ResistJam!

Thanks to Connor Sherlock for providing a link to a page on how to easily make walking simulators.

Built with Unity

Environment made with Sketchup

Audio made with Bosca Ceoil

P.S. I haven't been able to test the builds for Windows and Linux; please let me know if they don't work for you.
